The Adventure of the Four Friends

When Lucy leaves England for New York, she feels happy for her mother but sad because she is not going to see her best friend, Chloe, all the time. She goes to this new school called St. Ravens. Cara, Cerise and Gracie ask to be her friends but she ignores them and walks away. At lunch time, Lucy gets tricked by the three evil cats, Forax, Borax and Torax, and she decides to work with the girls to try and make the cats and headmistress good.
